name: Query Registry
description: Adversaries may interact with the Windows Registry to gather information about the system, configuration, and installed software.
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Qq][Uu][Ee][Rr][Yy].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Aa][Vv][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ee][Xx][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt].*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ll][Oo][Gg][Oo][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt][Dd][Ee][Ll][Aa][Yy][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line:(*query* OR *save* OR *export*) AND process.command_line:(*currentVersion\\windows* OR *winlogon\\* OR *currentVersion\\shellServiceObjectDelayLoad* OR *currentVersion\\run* OR *currentVersion\\policies\\explorer\\run* OR *currentcontrolset\\services*))`
